metaData.descriptionCS: The child identifies the common concept being described in a series of clues.

choiceList.question:
This is an animal that goes “woof.” What is it?

Allow approximately 5 seconds for a response.
choiceList.correct: [Dog]: Say, Right. A dog is an animal that goes “woof.” Let’s try another one.
choiceList.wrong: Say, It is a dog. A dog is an animal that goes “woof.” Let’s try another one.

choiceList.question:
This has a long handle...What is it?

Allow approximately 5 seconds for a response.
choiceList.correct: [Mop]: Say, Right. A mop has a long handle. Let's try another one.

choiceList.question:
This has a long handle, and is used with water to clean the floor. What is it?

Allow approximately 5 seconds for a response.
choiceList.correct: [Mop]: Say, Right. A mop has a long handle, and is used with water to clean the floor. Let's try another one.
choiceList.wrong: Say, It is a mop. A mop has a long handle, and is used with water to clean the floor. Let's try another one.

choiceList.question: This is used to dry yourself after a bath.

sampleAnswers.correct: Towel; Hair-dryer; Blow-dryer; Rag; Cloth
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Bathtub; Bathroom

choiceList.question: This has a knob and people can open it and walk through it.

sampleAnswers.correct: Door; Screen door [Any specific door]; Gate
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Door (knob, handle); Cabinet

choiceList.question: This is the part of your head used to smell things.

sampleAnswers.correct: Nose; Nostril
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Face; Mind; Brain; Sense; Mouth; Tongue

choiceList.question: This is an animal with a long trunk and big ears.

sampleAnswers.correct: Elephant
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Deer; Aardvark; Anteater

choiceList.question: This is something you wear to cover your head.

sampleAnswers.correct: Hat; Baseball hat [Any specific hat]; Hood; Cap; Helmet; Scarf; Wig; Hair; Bandana; Mask
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Blanket; Towel

choiceList.question: This is a room where people sleep.

sampleAnswers.correct: Bedroom; Guest Room
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Bed; Apartment; Hotel

choiceList.question: This is on the ground after it rains...
and it can make your clothes dirty.

sampleAnswers.correct: Mud; Wet (grass, dirt); Puddles; Dirty water; Snow; Slush; Ice
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Frost; Moisture; Grass; Water; Dirt; Clay

choiceList.question: This comes in many colors...
and it is used on walls.

sampleAnswers.correct: Paint; Wallpaper; Picture; Frame; Poster; Curtains; Fabric; Painting; Chalk
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Rainbow; Fall leaves; Crayons; Markers; Pen

choiceList.question: This is a place of learning...
and it can have many things from the past in it.

sampleAnswers.correct: School; College; University; Classroom; Class; Museum; Library; Church
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Laboratory; Book; Memory; Daycare; Home

choiceList.question: This is up in the sky...
and you can only see these at night.

sampleAnswers.correct: Stars; Northern Lights; Aurora borealis; Constellations; Planets; Satellite; Firefly
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Sun; Moon; Clouds; Bats; Owls; Airplanes

choiceList.question: This is what people do to make things "like new"...
and people do this to things that are broken.

sampleAnswers.correct: Repair; Fix; Rebuild; Reassemble; Refurbish; Renovate; Restore; Put back together; Mend; Reconstruct; Repaint; Refurnish; Refinish
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Redo; Renew; Build; Upgrade; Clean; Refresh; Take it to the shop; Glue; Tape

choiceList.question: This can make food taste better...
and it can be found in the ocean.

sampleAnswers.correct: Salt
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Water; Seaweed; Seasonings

choiceList.question: This is found in nature...
and it has water flowing from its mouth.

sampleAnswers.correct: River; Stream; Creek; Brook; Spring; Waterfall; Fountain; Harbor; Bay; Inlet
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Ocean; Sea; Whale; Rain; Well; Canal

choiceList.question: These are protected by skin and bones...
and they can sometimes be replaced.

sampleAnswers.correct: Organ; Heart; [Any organ that can be replaced]; Tissue; Blood; Plasma; Nerves; Muscle; Arteries; Veins; Bone marrow [Any tissue that can be replaced]; Cartilage
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Skin; Tonsils; Brain; Teeth; Bones; Operation; Body parts; Insides; Cell

choiceList.question: This can be broken...
and it is written down to protect people.

sampleAnswers.correct: Law; Rule; Contract; Policy; Will; Constitution; Declaration of Independence [Any specific historic document]; Treaty; Amendment; Agreement; Rights
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Pledge; Insurance; Instructions

choiceList.question: This leads to new discoveries...
and it involves a step-by-step process...
and it may include experiments.

sampleAnswers.correct: Science; Research; Scientific method; Inventing; Invention; Investigation; Biology [Any specific science]; Problem solving; Experimentation; Deductive reasoning; Hypothesis; Exploration; Technology; Theories
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Lab tests; Testing; Projects; Microscopes; Learning; Teaching; Study

choiceList.question: This allows people to do or own something...
and it is given by the government...
and people may have to take a test to get it.

sampleAnswers.correct: Visa; License; Driver's license [Any specific license]; Permit; Green card; Citizenship; Scholarship; Grant; Naturalization; Patent; Copyright; Diploma; Degree
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Welfare; Food stamps; Right to vote; Land grant; Job; Work; Grade

choiceList.question: This is something most people want...
and conflict prevents it...
and governments try to keep it.

sampleAnswers.correct: Peace; Freedom; Liberty; Law; Security; Control; Power; Order; Justice; Rights; Rules; Money; Wealth; Safety; Authority
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Revolution; Ownership of land; Leadership; State; Country

choiceList.question: This is something everything has...
and it changes every year...
and it can never decrease.

sampleAnswers.correct: Age; Birthday; Height
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Calendar; Years; Months; Weight; Size; Time; Growth; Skin; Weather; Temperature; Air

choiceList.question: This can't be touched ...
and it can't go backward ...
and it can't stop.

sampleAnswers.correct: Time; Aging; Gravity; Earth's rotation; Light
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Age; Wind; History; Future; Air; Year [Any specific unit of time]

choiceList.question: This is a place...
and it is protected from the weather...
and it is found within something else.

sampleAnswers.correct: Inside; Room; Bedroom [Any specific room]; Basement; Storm cellar; Attic; Indoors; Vault; Safe; Shelter; (Underground, Bomb, Fallout) shelter; Cave; Tunnel; Bunker
sampleAnswers.incorrect: House; [Any specific building]; Underground; Harbor; Cove; Apartment; Store in a mall

choiceList.question: This can be a river...
and wars can change it...
and two countries can share it.

sampleAnswers.correct: Boundary; Border; Border line; Territory (marker, line); Canal; Rio Grande [Any specific river border]
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Dam; Bridge; Divide; Landmark; Wall; Nile [Any specific non-border river]; Split between

choiceList.question: This is made by people...
and it can not be touched...
and it has already happened.

sampleAnswers.correct: History; Past; Past (actions, thoughts, decisions, mistakes); Yesterday; Memories; Discoveries
sampleAnswers.incorrect: News story; Future; War; Millennium; [Any historical event]; Baby; Birth

choiceList.question: This has never been seen or done before...
and it can make our lives better or easier...
and it is a product of the mind.

sampleAnswers.correct: Discovery; Invention; Innovation; Technology; Imagination; Creativity; Dream
sampleAnswers.incorrect: Hope; Happiness; Intergalactic travel [Any discovery that has not happened]; Thoughts; Learning; Peace; Idea; Telepathy; Information

consecutiveZerosDiscontinueRule.description: This subtest discontinues after 5 consecutive scores of 0 points.
